REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f8399 reute d f BC-METROMEDIA-CUTS-SOME 03-18 0044

TEXT.TITLE: METROMEDIA CUTS SOME LONG DISTANCE PHONE RATES
TEXT.BODY:
<Metromedia Co's> Metromedia Long Distance unit said it lowered interstate long distance rates for business customers by an average of 10 pct. The cuts were effective March one.
Reuter
